import React from 'react'; import './Header.css' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useGlobalContext } from './Main'; const Header = () => { const {search,onchange,searchNews}=useGlobalContext(); return ( <>

TECH NEWS APP

{onchange(event.target.value)}} >

  • General
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Technology
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Sports
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Entertainment
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Health
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Science
  • {event.preventDefault(); searchNews("Technology")} }> Business
) } export default Header;
